About Me

I'm Omkar Bhavare, a Software Development Engineer based in Pune, with a zest for creating impactful digital experiences. With nearly three years of experience in Full-Stack development, I specialize in React.js, JavaScript, and AWS. I thrive on transforming complex challenges into elegant solutions.

Outside of work, I'm an avid tech enthusiast who loves exploring new trends and tools in development. Whether it's building a collaborative real-time code editor or optimizing performance for gaming applications, I enjoy pushing the boundaries of what's possible with technology.

I invite you to connect with me if you're interested in collaboration or simply want to share insights about the ever-evolving tech landscape!

My works

IMDB+ Clone

Built an IMDb rating clone featuring real-time data, pagination, search, bookmarking, manual ratings, multilingual support, and local storage!

  • React
  • Javascript
  • Tailwind
  • NodeJS

Expense Tracker

Developed an Expense Tracker app to manage accounts effectively, enabling users to log expenses, categorize transactions & latest trends in economy.

  • React
  • Restful APIs
  • NodeJs

Swiggy Clone

I'm building a Swiggy clone, a feature-rich food delivery application that includes functionalities like user authentication, restaurant listing, order & payment.

  • React
  • Redux
  • Swiggy API
  • Tailwind
  • NodeJS
  • JEST

Hirit Job Portal + Resume Builder

Built an engaging Hirit Job Portal for users to search jobs and create resumes, while recruiters can easily post listings!

  • React
  • Redux
  • Javascript
  • Tailwind
  • Supabase
